name: I don't want to be alone
name_original: I don't want to be alone
description:
Please play this with sound on. We're very proud of the sound design.

Controlling the two siblings, two players must work together to reunite them inside the deep and dark forest.
The characters can scream using E and Spacebar.

Created for the 2021 Global Game Jam along with August Palving Brauner. The theme of the jam was "Lost & Found".
